title: ARAM Question
body: Just curious if there has to be a Cait every game or if Riot is just sticking to it's normal hatred of balance and fun. Thanks!

replies.body:
She was on free rotation last week (ended yesterday).
Are you still seeing a bunch of her today after the rotation changed?
now your only going to see raka and illaoi, have fun
True dat.  Add Karthus.  Going to be real fun when they and up on the same team.
